metas.name: The Shawshank Redemption
metas.description: Framed in the 1940s for the double murder of his wife and her lover, upstanding banker Andy Dufresne begins a new life at the Shawshank prison.

metas.name: The Godfather
metas.description: Spanning the years 1945 to 1955, a chronicle of the fictional Italian-American Corleone crime family.
